<template class="bg-secondary">


</template>

<script>

  import {stuffService} from '@/_services'
  
   
  export default {
  
  name: 'HelloWorld',
  data(){
    return{

    thing:{

              _id:'',
            title:'',
            description:'',
            imageUrl:'',
            userId:'',
            price:''
      
      
            } 
    }
  },
  methods:{

  addThing(){  
stuffService.addThing(this.thing).then(res=>{
  console.log(res)
}).catch(err=>(console.log(err)))

  }

},
   
  

      
 }         


        
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->

  margin: 40px 0 0;
}
